episodes.title: My Experience in a "Cult"
episodes.description:
In this video I yap (a lot) about my experience growing up Mormon. It covers the Mormon basics as well as why I left and some of the major issues I see with the organization.

Quick note: This is the first video I've made on this topic and I don't know how many more I'll make. If you're only here for the exmormon content that's still fire asfrick thanks for supporting!

*Check these sources out for more information:*
- LDS Unofficial Financial Reporting: https://thewidowsmite.org/us-land/
- Alyssa Grenfell Videos:
    - Church Help Line Issues: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cCbh_pMpI5o
    - JS Polygamy Cult: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4BJqFHEyW4s


What would you guys want to hear me talk about next?
-
-
-
#cult #mormon #exmormon #religion #kaysenpoint #videoessay
subjects: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-Day Saints
